meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Michael Townes Timothy Shuker-Haines Cathy Bloedorn Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6710.

td.p: Michael Townes, an English and Language Arts teacher from Greenville, South Carolina
Timothy Shuker-Haines, a high school history teacher from Williamstown, Massachusetts
Cathy Bloedorn, a chemistry and forsenics teacher from Ellicott City, Maryland

tr.td: ON HIS PRESIDENCY'S SECRET SERVICE
RAP STAGE NAMES
UNIFORMS
TEACHERS' LOUNGE CUISINE
SAME FIRST & LAST LETTER
THE ONION DESCRIBES THE COUNTRY
(Alex: You identify the country for us, obviously.)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Teacher: When I say "Bloe," you say "dorn"! Bloe!)
(Cathy Bloedorn\'s students at Howard High School: Dorn!)
(Teacher: Bloe!)
(Students: Dorn!)
(Teacher: Bloe!)
(Students: Dorn!)
[Cheers and applause]

Andrew Johnson

Michael
')

tr.td: Cathy
Timothy
Michael
NOTED PERSONALITIES IN THE WORLD ALMANAC
READING THE DETECTIVES
GIVE US 2 C's & AN A
(Alex: ...'cause they'll come up in each correct response.)
DISEASES
RAID!
THE LENGTH OF THE MOVIE

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Cathy
Timothy
Michael

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [To Cathy] Who is [*]?--from Pygmalion and My Fair Lady.)
...
(Alex: Timothy, congratulations, sir. You are a semifinalist. You get to play again on our program.)
(Timothy: That\'s great.)
(Alex: And here are the other winners of our quarterfinal matches this week.)
(Anne: Anne Baxter, Ypsilanti, Michigan.)
(Patrick: Patrick Dillon, Huntington, New York.)
(Eli: Eli Barrieau, Hardwick, Massachusetts.)
(John: John Pearson, Richardson, Texas.)
(Alex: And now the high scorers among non-winners. You\'ll notice something that links them all together. Here they are.)
(Mary Beth: Mary Beth Hammerstrom, Anchorage, Alaska.)
(Becky: Becky Giardina, Martinez, Georgia.)
(Maryanne: Maryanne Lewell from Saint John, New Brunswick, Canada.)
(Katie: Katie Moriarty, Cincinnati, Ohio.)
(Alex: Yeah, they\'re all women, and we\'re putting them all to work at the beginning of next week. Join us then. Take care, everybody.)
CathyWho is Henry Higgins?
$6,395
TimothyWho is Henry Higgins?
$7,000
MichaelWho is... ?
$2,600
Henry Higgins')
